title: UNICEF  - ASWA II
subtitle: Accelerated Sanitation and Water for All
project_plan_summary:
The programme targets twelve countries in West and Central Africa: Benin, Central African Republic, Cote dâ€™Ivoire, Ghana, Guinea Conakry, Liberia, Mali, Mauritania and Sierra Leone, Burkina Faso, Niger and Nigeria. The countries are part of DGIS development funding and programme execution is comprehensive, thus inter-learning between the twelve countries is key.

target_group:
**Direct Beneficiaries:  **National WASH Sector and WCA Regional WASH actors:

Â·      WASH sector ministries of the nine countries

Â·       WASH sector ministries of other regions (since data will be made available and shared with ESAR countries)

WASH sector ministries include M&E staff, data managers, data analysts, water and sanitation directors, selected NGOs, subnational WASH sector actors, decentralised authorities at the level of districts, regions, and provinces, programme implementation staff, and data collectors. Others: selected staff of CSOs, multilaterals, private organisations. In the future: the populations of the various countries where the program will be implemented; the assumption is that by improved group of WASH services, informed decision making will improve WASH services delivery.
